Package com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.parser

Class Utils

java.lang.Object
com.mackenziehigh.autumn.lang.compiler.parser.Utils
public final class Utils extends Object
This class is used by the parser to help facilitate the building of an abstract-syntax-tree. This class helps connect the parser to the tree-builder. Specifically, this class provides a location to store state and place utility methods.

Warning: Only one parser can be utilizing this class at a time.

Author:
Mackenzie High
